00087 static  bit  zlp;
00088 static  U8   endpoint_status[MAX_EP_NB];
00089 static  U8   device_status=DEVICE_STATUS;
00090 
00091 #ifdef __GNUC__
00092         PGM_VOID_P pbuffer;
00093 #else
00094         U8   code *pbuffer;
00095 #endif
00096         U8   data_to_transfer;
00097 
00098         U16  wInterface;
00099 
00100 static  U8   bmRequestType;
00101         U8      remote_wakeup_feature=DISABLE; 
00102         U8   usb_configuration_nb;
00103 extern  bit     usb_connected;
00104 extern  code    S_usb_device_descriptor             usb_user_device_descriptor;
00105 extern  code    S_usb_user_configuration_descriptor usb_user_configuration_descriptor;

00107 U8      usb_remote_wup_feature;  // Store ENABLED value if a SetFeature(RemoteWakeUp) has been received

00128 void usb_process_request(void)
00129 {
00130    U8  bmRequest;
00131 
00132    Usb_ack_control_out();
00133    bmRequestType = Usb_read_byte();
00134    bmRequest     = Usb_read_byte();
00135 
00136    switch (bmRequest)
00137    {
00138     case SETUP_GET_DESCRIPTOR:
00139          if (USB_SETUP_GET_STAND_DEVICE == bmRequestType) { usb_get_descriptor(); }
00140          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00141          break;
00142 
00143     case SETUP_GET_CONFIGURATION:
00144          if (USB_SETUP_GET_STAND_DEVICE == bmRequestType) { usb_get_configuration(); }
00145          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00146          break;
00147 
00148     case SETUP_SET_ADDRESS:
00149          if (USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_DEVICE == bmRequestType) { usb_set_address(); }
00150          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00151          break;
00152 
00153     case SETUP_SET_CONFIGURATION:
00154          if (USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_DEVICE == bmRequestType) { usb_set_configuration(); }
00155          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00156          break;
00157 
00158     case SETUP_CLEAR_FEATURE:
00159          if (USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_ENDPOINT >= bmRequestType) { usb_clear_feature(); }
00160          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00161          break;
00162 
00163     case SETUP_SET_FEATURE:
00164          if (USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_ENDPOINT >= bmRequestType) { usb_set_feature(); }
00165          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00166          break;
00167 
00168     case SETUP_GET_STATUS:
00169          if ((0x7F < bmRequestType) & (0x82 >= bmRequestType))
00170                                     { usb_get_status(); }
00171          else                       { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00172          break;
00173 
00174     case SETUP_GET_INTERFACE:
00175           if (bmRequestType == USB_SETUP_GET_STAND_INTERFACE) { usb_get_interface(); }
00176           else { usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest); }
00177           break;
00178 
00179 
00180     case SETUP_SET_INTERFACE:
00181       if (bmRequestType == USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_INTERFACE) {usb_set_interface();}
00182       break;
00183 
00184     case SETUP_SET_DESCRIPTOR:
00185     case SETUP_SYNCH_FRAME:
00186     default: 
00187          if(usb_user_read_request(bmRequestType, bmRequest) == FALSE)
00188          {
00189             Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00190             Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00191             return;
00192          }
00193          break;
00194   }
00195 }

00209 void usb_set_address(void)
00210 {
00211    U8 addr = Usb_read_byte();
00212    Usb_configure_address(addr);
00213 
00214    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00215 
00216    Usb_send_control_in();                    
00217    while(!Is_usb_in_ready());                
00218 
00219    Usb_enable_address();
00220 }

00228 void usb_set_configuration( void )
00229 {
00230 U8 configuration_number;
00231 
00232    configuration_number = Usb_read_byte();
00233 
00234    if (configuration_number <= NB_CONFIGURATION)
00235    {
00236       Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00237       usb_configuration_nb = configuration_number;
00238    }
00239    else
00240    {
00243       Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00244       Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00245       return;
00246    }
00247 
00248    Usb_send_control_in();                    
00249 
00250    usb_user_endpoint_init(usb_configuration_nb);  
00251    Usb_set_configuration_action();
00252 }
00253

00261 void usb_get_descriptor(void)
00262 {
00263 U16  wLength;
00264 U8   descriptor_type ;
00265 U8   string_type;
00266 U8   dummy;
00267 U8   nb_byte;
00268 
00269    zlp             = FALSE;                  /* no zero length packet */
00270    string_type     = Usb_read_byte();        /* read LSB of wValue    */
00271    descriptor_type = Usb_read_byte();        /* read MSB of wValue    */
00272 
00273    switch (descriptor_type)
00274    {
00275     case DESCRIPTOR_DEVICE:
00276       data_to_transfer = Usb_get_dev_desc_length(); 
00277       pbuffer          = Usb_get_dev_desc_pointer();
00278       break;
00279     case DESCRIPTOR_CONFIGURATION:
00280       data_to_transfer = Usb_get_conf_desc_length(); 
00281       pbuffer          = Usb_get_conf_desc_pointer();
00282       break;
00283     default:
00284       if( usb_user_get_descriptor(descriptor_type, string_type)==FALSE )
00285       {
00286          Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00287          Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00288          return;
00289       }
00290       break;
00291    }
00292 
00293    dummy = Usb_read_byte();                     
00294    dummy = Usb_read_byte();
00295    LSB(wLength) = Usb_read_byte();              
00296    MSB(wLength) = Usb_read_byte();
00297    Usb_ack_receive_setup() ;                  
00298 
00299    if (wLength > data_to_transfer)
00300    {
00301       if ((data_to_transfer % EP_CONTROL_LENGTH) == 0) { zlp = TRUE; }
00302       else { zlp = FALSE; }                   
00303    }
00304    else
00305    {
00306       data_to_transfer = (U8)wLength;         
00307    }
00308 
00309    Usb_ack_nak_out();
00310 
00311    while((data_to_transfer != 0) && (!Is_usb_nak_out_sent()))
00312    {
00313       while(!Is_usb_read_control_enabled())
00314       {
00315         if (Is_usb_nak_out_sent())
00316           break;    // don't clear the flag now, it will be cleared after
00317       }
00318 
00319       nb_byte=0;
00320       while(data_to_transfer != 0)        
00321       {
00322          if(nb_byte++==EP_CONTROL_LENGTH) 
00323          {
00324             break;
00325          }
00326 
00327 #ifndef __GNUC__
00328          Usb_write_byte(*pbuffer++);
00329 #else    // AVRGCC does not support point to PGM space
00330          Usb_write_byte(pgm_read_byte_near((unsigned int)pbuffer++));
00331 #endif
00332          data_to_transfer --;
00333       }
00334 
00335       if (Is_usb_nak_out_sent())
00336         break;
00337       else
00338         Usb_send_control_in();
00339    }
00340 
00341    if((zlp == TRUE) && (!Is_usb_nak_out_sent()))
00342    {
00343      while(!Is_usb_read_control_enabled());
00344      Usb_send_control_in();
00345    }
00346 
00347    while (!(Is_usb_nak_out_sent()));
00348    Usb_ack_nak_out();       // clear NAKOUTI
00349    Usb_ack_control_out();   // clear RXOUTI
00350 
00351 
00352 
00353 }

00367 void usb_get_configuration(void)
00368 {
00369    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00370 
00371    Usb_write_byte(usb_configuration_nb);
00372    Usb_ack_in_ready();
00373 
00374    while( !Is_usb_receive_out() );
00375    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00376 }
00377 
00389 void usb_get_status(void)
00390 {
00391 U8 wIndex;
00392 U8 dummy;
00393 
00394    dummy    = Usb_read_byte();                 
00395    dummy    = Usb_read_byte();                 
00396    wIndex = Usb_read_byte();
00397 
00398    switch(bmRequestType)
00399    {
00400     case USB_SETUP_GET_STAND_DEVICE:    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00401                                    Usb_write_byte(device_status);
00402                                    break;
00403 
00404     case USB_SETUP_GET_STAND_INTERFACE: Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00405                                    Usb_write_byte(INTERFACE_STATUS);
00406                                    break;
00407 
00408     case USB_SETUP_GET_STAND_ENDPOINT:  Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00409                                    wIndex = wIndex & MSK_EP_DIR;
00410                                    Usb_write_byte(endpoint_status[wIndex]);
00411                                    break;
00412     default:
00413                                    Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00414                                    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00415                                    return;
00416    }
00417 
00418    Usb_write_byte(0x00);
00419    Usb_send_control_in();
00420 
00421    while( !Is_usb_receive_out() );
00422    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00423 }
00424 
00425 
00437 void usb_set_feature(void)
00438 {
00439 U8 wValue;
00440 U8 wIndex;
00441 U8 dummy;
00442 
00443   switch (bmRequestType)
00444    {
00445     case USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_DEVICE:
00446       wValue = Usb_read_byte();
00447       switch (wValue)
00448       {
00449          case USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP:
00450             if ((wValue == FEATURE_DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP) && (USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP_FEATURE == ENABLED))
00451             {
00452                 device_status |= USB_STATUS_REMOTEWAKEUP;
00453                 remote_wakeup_feature = ENABLED;
00454                 Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00455                 Usb_send_control_in();
00456             }
00457             else
00458             {
00459                Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00460                Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00461             }
00462             break;
00463             
00464             
00465             
00466          default:
00467          Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00468          Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00469          break;
00470       }
00471       break;
00472 
00473   case USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_INTERFACE:
00476       Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00477       Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00478     break;
00479 
00480   case USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_ENDPOINT:
00481       wValue = Usb_read_byte();
00482       dummy    = Usb_read_byte();                
00483 
00484       if (wValue == FEATURE_ENDPOINT_HALT)
00485       {
00486          wIndex = (Usb_read_byte() & MSK_EP_DIR);
00487 
00488          if (wIndex == EP_CONTROL)
00489          {
00490             Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00491             Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00492          }
00493 
00494          Usb_select_endpoint(wIndex);
00495          if(Is_usb_endpoint_enabled())
00496          {
00497             Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00498             Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00499             endpoint_status[wIndex] = 0x01;
00500             Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00501             Usb_send_control_in();
00502          }
00503          else
00504          {
00505             Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00506             Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00507             Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00508          }
00509       }
00510       else
00511       {
00512          Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00513          Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00514       }
00515     break;
00516 
00517   default:
00518     Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00519     Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00520     break;
00521    }
00522 }
00523 
00524 
00535 void usb_clear_feature(void)
00536 {
00537 U8 wValue;
00538 U8 wIndex;
00539 U8 dummy;
00540 
00541    if (bmRequestType == USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_DEVICE)
00542    {
00543      wValue = Usb_read_byte();
00544       if ((wValue == FEATURE_DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP) && (USB_REMOTE_WAKEUP_FEATURE == ENABLED))
00545      {
00546        device_status &= ~USB_STATUS_REMOTEWAKEUP;
00547          remote_wakeup_feature = DISABLED;
00548        Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00549        Usb_send_control_in();
00550      }
00551      else
00552      {
00553       Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00554       Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00555      }
00556       return;
00557    }
00558    else if (bmRequestType == USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_INTERFACE)
00559    {
00562       Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00563       Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00564       return;
00565    }
00566    else if (bmRequestType == USB_SETUP_SET_STAND_ENDPOINT)
00567    {
00568       wValue = Usb_read_byte();
00569       dummy  = Usb_read_byte();                
00570 
00571       if (wValue == FEATURE_ENDPOINT_HALT)
00572       {
00573          wIndex = (Usb_read_byte() & MSK_EP_DIR);
00574 
00575          Usb_select_endpoint(wIndex);
00576          if(Is_usb_endpoint_enabled())
00577          {
00578             if(wIndex != EP_CONTROL)
00579             {
00580                Usb_disable_stall_handshake();
00581                Usb_reset_endpoint(wIndex);
00582                Usb_reset_data_toggle();
00583             }
00584             Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00585             endpoint_status[wIndex] = 0x00;
00586             Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00587             Usb_send_control_in();
00588          }
00589          else
00590          {
00591             Usb_select_endpoint(EP_CONTROL);
00592             Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00593             Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00594             return;
00595          }
00596       }
00597       else
00598       {
00599          Usb_enable_stall_handshake();
00600          Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00601          return;
00602       }
00603    }
00604 }

00618 void usb_get_interface (void)
00619 {
00620    Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00621    Usb_send_control_in();
00622 
00623    while( !Is_usb_receive_out() );
00624    Usb_ack_receive_out();
00625 }
00626 
00637 void usb_set_interface (void)
00638 {
00639   Usb_ack_receive_setup();
00640   Usb_send_control_in();                    
00641   while(!Is_usb_in_ready());
00642 }
00643 
00652 void usb_generate_remote_wakeup(void)
00653 {
00654    if(Is_pll_ready()==FALSE)
00655    {
00656       Pll_start_auto();
00657       Wait_pll_ready();
00658    }
00659    Usb_unfreeze_clock();
00660    if (remote_wakeup_feature == ENABLED)
00661    {
00662       Usb_initiate_remote_wake_up();
00663       remote_wakeup_feature = DISABLED;
00664    }
00665 }
